name: Fire Bubby
description:
In Fire Bubby, you deploy a team of yokai-like creatures to save a town that is burning down. Players recruit different bubby to try and receive recompense for saving the buildings and townspeople.

For best results, play in fullscreen mode!

Built in Unity, sound effects made in BFXR

Programming by Chris Nearman (@sheepparade) & Adam Pettyjohn
Art by Samantha Mintz
